TopicTitle: Ability to disable the "Pumping Sim Once" loading stage if it is not absolutely necessary

Articles.Content:
We should be able to disable it if it is not absolutely necessary, since it takes a very long time on certain computers near the lower end of the system requirements.

Edited February 25, 2023 by qwery123
Why would they do it if it’s not necessary?
Found out it is not actually that loading stage the problem is with, but the next stage where it tries to create textures.
